story_teamaquamagma_01_05000/2401_1101_0:
Brendan, May, and Wally have made it to an
impressive twenty-win streak!

Brilliant! Amazing! How far can they take this
winning streak?!
story_teamaquamagma_01_05000/2401_1001_0: Brendan! Wally! We did it! We won again!

That last combination attack with Latios worked so
well, Brendan!

Yeah! I’m getting better at working together
with Latios!

Latios is very gentle, but I can count on
him when I really need to!

Your teamwork with Blaziken was perfect as
well, May!
story_teamaquamagma_01_05000/2401_1001_1:
I’ve known Blaziken for a long time, ever since we
traveled around Hoenn.
We’ve gotta work hard so we don’t fall behind!
story_teamaquamagma_01_05000/2401_1101_1: And now, their next opponents are the ruffianly—

We’ve just received some information about the
disturbance that just occurred!

It appears that Team Magma and Team Aqua are
clashing in a nearby town!
Therefore, this tournament will be postponed.
story_teamaquamagma_01_05000/2401_1101_2:
Everyone! Please stay calm and evacuate to a
safe place!
story_teamaquamagma_01_05000/2401_1001_2:
If what they said is true, we can’t just stand back
and watch this happen.

Agreed! If Team Magma and Team Aqua are
fighting, we have to stop them!
